titleStmt.title: A funerall elegy upon the most honored upon Earth, and now glorious in Heaven, His Excellency Robert Devereux Earl of Essex and Ewe Viscount Hereford, Lord Ferrers of Chartly Bourchier and Louvaine, late Generall of England.
titleStmt.author: Mill, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Macock for William Ley, and are to be sold at his shop at Pauls Chaine,

notesStmt.note: In verse: "VVhat do our sighs and tears when Essex dyes,"...
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
